character_schedule.morning: Discover accelerator broke down overnight; troubleshoot and angrily call maintenance.
character_schedule.afternoon: Write report on existing data; grumble about equipment.
character_schedule.evening: Visit friend’s lab working on optical metasurface-inspired AI; enjoy the change of pace.

user_schedule.morning: Implements a new caching strategy that reduces server load by 40%. Doesn’t mention it in the daily report.
user_schedule.afternoon: Is approached by a manager who thanks him in front of others. He mumbles something and walks away quickly.
user_schedule.evening: Compiles a list of books to read next month. Most are about operating systems and concurrency.

relationship: A deep bond has been established between the two, whether it is friendship or love. They can express their emotions and thoughts freely without any reservations, and the other person has become a very important part of their life. No matter what happens, they think of each other first and provide mutual support and companionship.
